info.description:
This is an interactive API reference for the Scopevisio REST API.

Below you will see the main sections of the API. Click each section in order to see the endpoints that are available in that category and use the 'Try it out' button to make API calls.

For endpoints that require authentication you can click the lock symbol in the top right of the endpoint description, which will take you to a login form.

Authentication

In order to use the "Try it out" function in Swagger you need your own Scopevisio account. If you have not set up a Scopevisio user account already you can do so here.

Example Application

We also have an example application you can reach here . Usage requires a Scopevisio account.

Search Documentation

Our documentation regarding search specification and paging .

General Documentation

Our general documentation can be found here .
info.title: Scopevisio OpenScope REST API

parameters.description: validFrom (Planungszeit von). The start of the time range to show the availability of the human resources. It must be provided as an epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

parameters.name: validTill
parameters.description: validTill (Planungszeit bis). The end of the time range to show the availability of the human resources. It must be provided as an epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

To retrieve a sales project use the endpoint project/{id}. Required profile(s): Projekte (Bearbeiten).

Updates the Scopevisio sales project (Vertriebsprojekt) with the given id. It is not possible to convert a Lead (project "sphereLead" set) to Interessent ("sphereInterested" set) via webservice. The conversion must be done via the Scopevisio client. Setting the interested fields like intrestedBudget, intrestedAuthority, etc. is only possible if the projectis already Interessent ("sphereInterested" set). Otherwise they are overridden by the conversion process. To retrieve a sales project use the endpoint project/{id}. Required profile(s): Projekte (Bearbeiten).

parameters.description: search filter in JSON format. See also our search documentation.

oauth.description: Authorization is provided by a Scopevisio web page. You can leave the field client_secret blank.

category.description: category (Projektkategorie), if not given, it is set to "Kundenprojekt"

type2.description: type2 (Projektart) - the allowable values depend on the project category. Please check the Scopevisio desktop application for all allowable values per category. The example values are for category "Kundenprojekt"

description.example: Kundenprojekt mit Acme für Verbesserung Produkt 1A

legacyNumber.description: legacyNumber (ID Vorsystem). The Id of the project used in the previous system.

contactPerson.description: contactPerson (Ansprechpartner beim Kunden/Lead/Interessenten). The contact id of the contact person for the project - the selected contact must be an employee of the project contact and the project contact must be main employer.

ownerUid.description: ownerUid (Projektinhaber). Uid of the user, who is the owner of this project. Refer to /users to retrieve the uid

workdays.description: workdays (Arbeitstage). Please check the Scopevisio desktop application for all allowable values for workdays

estimatedHoursMode.description: estimatedHoursMode (checbox Manuell). Toggle if estimated hours is set manually or not, 0 = false, 1 = true

estimatedHours.description: Estimated hours field is evaluated only if estimatedHoursMode is present and set to true

dimensionName.description: dimensionName (Projektkostenstelle) Name of the dimensionNumber. If not given, it is set to the project name.

phase.description: phase (Projekt-Phase) - the allowable values depend on the project category. Please check the Scopevisio desktop application for all allowable values per category. The example values are for category "Kundenprojekt"

status.description: status (Projekt-Status) - the allowable values depend on the project category. Please checkthe Scopevisio desktop application for all allowable values per category. The example values are for category "Kundenprojekt"

customFields.description: custom fields (Benutzerdefinierte Felder)- these are available for projects only if your client supports sales projects

projectEmployees.description: project employees are all contacts involved in the project (Projektbeteiligte)

readPermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

readPermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionProfiles.example: Firmen und Benutzer - alle Rechte,Finanzen - alle Rechte
writePermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for full access, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

projectId.description: projectId (Projekt). Sets also projectNumber, projectName. Please look up in your sales (Vertriebs-) and/or outgoing invoice settings (Abrechnungseinstellungen) to check if projectId is mandatory.

customerContactId.description: customerContactId (Lead/Interessent/Kunde). Sets also customerPersonalAccountId, customerPersonalAccountNumber, customerPersonalAccountName, customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber, customerName, customerNameExtra, customerNumber, customerContactName, customerContactCustomerNumber. Must be set if project is not mandatory. Ignored otherwise.

customerContactName.description: customerContactName - the name of the contact with the given customerContactId.

customerContactCustomerNumber.description: The customer number of the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Allgemein. The field contact number (Kontaktnummer) is the customerContactCustomerNumber.

customerPersonalAccountId.description: The master id of personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId.

customerPersonalAccountNumber.description: The number of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account number (Kontonummer) is the customerPersonalAccountNumber. This field also corresponds to field "debitorNumber" from endpoint  /contact/{customerContactId} and field  "number" from /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountName.description: The name of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account name (Kontoname) is the customerPersonalAccountName. This field also corresponds to field "name" from endpoint /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.description: The customer number of the personal account with the given customerPersonalAccountNumber. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor.  Field customer number (Kundennummer) is the customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.

customerName.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use field customerContactName.

customerNumber.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use fields customerContactCustomerNumber or customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.

customerNameExtra.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use fields customerContactCustomerNumber or customerPersonalAccountName.

name.example: RE-2018-1, KP für Muster AG vom 27.11.2018

customerContactPerson.description: customerContactPerson (Ansprechpartner). Sets also customerContactPersonName. The contact must be an employee of the project contact (contactId).

documentDate.description: documentDate (PZ-/Angebots-/Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/GS-/LS-Datum). If not given, it is set to the current date. Sets also documentDateMonth.

documentNumber.description: documentNumber (Potenzial-/Angebots-/Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/Gutschrifts-/Lieferscheinnummer).The field is mandatory. If not provided a document number is generated.

ourContactPerson.description: ourContactPerson (Potenzial-/Angebots- Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/Gutschrifts-/Lieferscheinbearbeiter). The UID of a Scopevisio user. The user must have a user contact (Aus Benutzerkontakt) for the current organisation. Setting this field also sets ourContactPersonName.

textIntro.example: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,\nwir erlauben uns, Ihnen wie folgt in Rechnung zu stellen:
textIntro.description: textIntro (Einleitungstext). Use "\n" to insert new line.

textExtro.example: Wir freuen uns, wenn Ihnen das Angebot zusagt und verbleiben mit freundlichen Grüßen
textExtro.description: textExtro (Schlusstext). Use "\n" to insert new line.

selectedAddress.description: selectedAddress (Adresse [Haupt-/Rechnungs-/Liefer-/freie Adresse]). 0 = Hauptadresse, 1 = Rechnungsadresse, 2 = freie Adresse, 3 = Lieferadresse

otherAddress.description: otherAddress (freie Adresse). Use "\n" to insert new line.

readPermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

readPermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionProfiles.example: Firmen und Benutzer - alle Rechte,Finanzen - alle Rechte
writePermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for full access, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

deliveryDate.description: deliveryDate (Leistungsdatum). The deliveryDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

deliveryDateTo.description: deliveryDateTo (Leistungsdatum-bis). The deliveryDateTo as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

endDiscount.description: endDiscount(Schlussrabatt), if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to true, then endDiscount should be an amount, if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to false then a percentage is needed.

paymentTypeName.description: paymentTypeName (Zahlungsart). If not provided for new invoice, the payment type from the personal account (connected to the customerContactId) is used. Sets also paymentType.

isPaid.description: isPaid (Auf exportiertem Beleg als Bezahlt ausweisen)

discountDate1.description: discountDate1 (Skontodatum 1). The discountDate1 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. If it is set either discountPercent1 or discountAmount1 must be set. If one of the payment term properties is provided (discountDate1, discountDate2, dueDate, discountPercent1, discountPercent2, discountAmount1, discountAmount2) when creating an invoice, then the form is used. Otherwise the payment term from the personal account (connected to the customerContactId) is used.

discountDate2.description: discountDate2 (Skontodatum 2). The discountDate2 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate1. If it is set either discountPercent2 or discountAmount2 must be set.

dueDate.description: dueDate (Fälligkeitsdatum). The dueDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate2.

discountPercent1.description: discountPercent1 (Skontosatz1). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountPercent2.description: discountPercent2 (Skontosatz2). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

explicitDiscount.description: explicitDiscount (Skontobeträge manuell eingeben). If set discountAmount(s) must be provided

discountAmount1.description: discountAmount1 (Skontobetrag1). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountAmount2.description: discountAmount2 (Skontobetrag2). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

zoneNumber.description: zoneNumber (Rechnungskreis). Please check your zone settings in the Scopevisio client application if the field is mandaotry.

stateName.description: state (Status des Auftrags). Sets also state.

copyProductsToPositions.description: Set to true if you want to use the existing products to create the positions. The product values are used only if the user has not provided values himself. E.g. if the singleAmount has been provided in the request body, the singleAmount from product is not used.

Positions form.description: Mandatory if creating new outgoing invoice documents.

data.description: Incoming invoice file (pdf) in base64 format. Allowed size: 20 MB. An exception is thrown otherwise.

name.example: 5 Tage 3% Skonto, 10 Tage 1% Skonto, 15 Tage netto
name.description: name (Bezeichnung). The name must be unique.

description.example: 5 Tage 3% Skonto, 10 Tage 1% Skonto, 15 Tage netto

validFrom.description: validFrom (gültig von), the validFrom as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. The time of the day has no importance for the validFrom date.

validTo.description: validTo (gültig bis), the validTo as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. The time of the day has no importance for the validTo date.

nextInvoiceDate.description: nextInvoiceDate (nächste Rechnung), the nextInvoiceDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. The time of the day has no importance for the nextInvoiceDate date.

contactId.description:
contactId (Kontakt Id), the id(Master Id) of the contact, to create a personal account for.
Either valid contactId or customerNumber or email must be provided to create a personal account.

customerNumber.description:
customerNumber, the customerNumber(Kontaktnummer) of the contact, to create a personal account for.
Either valid contactId or customerNumber or email must be provided to create a personal account.

email.description:
email, the email(one of the existing seven possibilities E-Mail-Adresse[geschäftlich], E-Mail-Adresse[geschäftlich 2]. etc.) of the contact, to create a personal account for.
Either valid contactId or customerNumber or email must be provided to create a personal account.

personalAccountNumber.description: personalAccountNumber (Kontonummer), the wished number of the created personal account. If no numberRangeNumber provided, then the number range fitting for the personalAccountNumber is set.

sumAccountNumber.description: sumAccountNumber (Sammelkonto Nummer), to be used in the created personal account. If no sumRangeNumber provided, then a default number will be set.

numberRangeNumber.description:
numberRangeNumber (Kreditoren-/Debitoren-Nummernkreis), the number of the number range for the personal account. If personalAccountNumber is not provided, the first available number for the provided numberRangeNumber is generated for the personal account. 
 If numberRangeNumber not provided,  the first found number range will be used. We recommend setting "numberRangeNumber" if more than one number ranges for this account type(debitor or kreditor) exist otherwise errors may occur if the number range is full. 
The default number ranges in the Scopevisio desktop applications are "2" for debitors and "3" for creditors

group.description: group (Kundengruppe/Kreditorengruppe), if the given group does not exist, it is created and assigned to the personal account.

vatCode.description: vatCode(Steuerkennzeichen) for the personal account. Please see vat matrix (Steuermatrix) in the Scopevisio client if you wish other than the standard allowable values.

currency.description: currency(Währung), the ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code

language.description: language(Sprache), please check the Scopeviso client application for allowable values

paymentTermId.description: paymentTermId (Zahlungsbedingung id), the id of the wished payment term for the personal account. If an existing paymentTerm should be assigned to the personal account, then use "paymentTermId" . If a new paymentTerm should be created, use the parameter "paymentTermForm". If both "paymentTermId" and "paymentTermForm" are provided, a payment term with the given "paymentTermId" is searched. If not found,the "paymentTermForm" is used. If a payment term with the given name is found, then it is assigned to the personal account, a new payment term is created otherwise.

paymentTermForm.description: paymentTermForm (Zahlungsbedingung), if an existing paymentTerm should be assigned to the personal account, then paymentTermId should be used. If a new paymentTerm should be created, use the parameter "paymentTermForm".If both "paymentTermId" and "paymentTermForm" are provided, a payment term with the given "paymentTermId" is searched. If not found,the "paymentTermForm" is used. If a payment term with the given name is found, then it is assigned to the personal account, a new payment term is created otherwise.

adjustVatKey.description: Replace the VAT key in the given rows with the vat key from the Scopevisio chart of accounts for this account.

autoCreateTax.description: Create automatically tax posting rows. In this case an extra row for the tax posting is not needed.

endDiscount.description: endDiscount(Schlussrabatt), if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to true, then endDiscount should be an amount, if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to false then a percentage is needed.

isPaid.description: isPaid (Auf exportiertem Beleg als Bezahlt ausweisen)

discountDate1.description: discountDate1 (Skontodatum 1). The discountDate1 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. If it is set either discountPercent1 or discountAmount1 must be set. If one of the payment term properties is provided (discountDate1, discountDate2, dueDate, discountPercent1, discountPercent2, discountAmount1, discountAmount2) when creating an invoice, then the form is used. Otherwise the payment term from the personal account (connected to the customerContactId) is used.

discountDate2.description: discountDate2 (Skontodatum 2). The discountDate2 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate1. If it is set either discountPercent2 or discountAmount2 must be set.

dueDate.description: dueDate (Fälligkeitsdatum). The dueDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate2.

discountPercent1.description: discountPercent1 (Skontosatz1). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountPercent2.description: discountPercent2 (Skontosatz2). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

explicitDiscount.description: explicitDiscount (Skontobeträge manuell eingeben). If set discountAmount(s) must be provided

discountAmount1.description: discountAmount1 (Skontobetrag1). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountAmount2.description: discountAmount2 (Skontobetrag2). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

zoneNumber.description: zoneNumber (Rechnungskreis). Please check your zone settings in the Scopevisio client application if the field is mandaotry.

locale.description: locale (Sprache). If not provided by the user the language(Sprache) from the contact with the given "customerContactId" is used. To be set correctly in the invoice the locale must be also set in the Scopevisio client application under "Stammdaten" > "Sprachen und Textbausteine" > "Sprachen für Aufgragsbelege bearbeiten". Otherwise the locale of the invoice is set to "Deutsch".

currency.description: currency(Währung), the ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code. If currency is provided there must be an exchange rate specified - either via the parameter "exchangeRate" or set in the Scopevisio client application. If currency is not provided, the currency from the contact with the given "customerContactId" is used.

exchangeRate.description: exchangeRate(Wechselkurs), evaluated only if "curency" is set. If not provided in the request an exchange rate must be configured in the Scopevisio client application.

vatMatrixDatevKeys.description: vatMatrixDatevKeys. Do you want to use the DATEV posting keys (BU-Schlüssel) from Scopevisios vat matrix? Standard value is true.

Must be set if project is not mandatory. Ignored otherwise.

The field contact number (Kontaktnummer) is the customerContactCustomerNumber.

customerPersonalAccountId.description: The master id of personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId.

customerPersonalAccountNumber.description: The number of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account number (Kontonummer) is the customerPersonalAccountNumber. This field also corresponds to field "debitorNumber" from endpoint  /contact/{customerContactId} and field  "number" from /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountName.description: The name of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account name (Kontoname) is the customerPersonalAccountName. This field also corresponds to field "name" from endpoint /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.description: The customer number of the personal account with the given customerPersonalAccountNumber. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor.  Field customer number (Kundennummer) is the customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.

sumAccountNumber.description: sumAccountNumber (Sammelkonto Nummer), to be used in the created personal account. If no sumRangeNumber provided, then a default number will be set.

numberRangeNumber.description:
numberRangeNumber (Kreditoren-/Debitoren-Nummernkreis), the number of the number range for the personal account. If personalAccountNumber is not provided, the first available number for the provided numberRangeNumber is generated for the personal account. 
 If numberRangeNumber not provided,  the first found number range will be used. We recommend setting "numberRangeNumber" if more than one number ranges for this account type(debitor or kreditor) exist otherwise errors may occur if the number range is full. 
The default number ranges in the Scopevisio desktop applications are "2" for debitors and "3" for creditors

paymentTermId.description: paymentTermId (Zahlungsbedingung id), the id of the wished payment term for the personal account. If an existing paymentTerm should be assigned to the personal account, then use "paymentTermId" . If a new paymentTerm should be created, use the parameter "paymentTermForm". If both "paymentTermId" and "paymentTermForm" are provided, a payment term with the given "paymentTermId" is searched. If not found,the "paymentTermForm" is used. If a payment term with the given name is found, then it is assigned to the personal account, a new payment term is created otherwise.

paymentTermForm.description: paymentTermForm (Zahlungsbedingung), if an existing paymentTerm should be assigned to the personal account, then paymentTermId should be used. If a new paymentTerm should be created, use the parameter "paymentTermForm".If both "paymentTermId" and "paymentTermForm" are provided, a payment term with the given "paymentTermId" is searched. If not found,the "paymentTermForm" is used. If a payment term with the given name is found, then it is assigned to the personal account, a new payment term is created otherwise.

estimatedHours.description: this parameter is evaluated only if setEstimatedHoursManually is set to true

standard.description: standard, whether or not this should be the standard bank connection for transfers or withdrawals.

projectId.description: projectId (Projekt). Sets also projectNumber, projectName. Please look up in your sales (Vertriebs-) and/or outgoing invoice settings (Abrechnungseinstellungen) to check if projectId is mandatory.

customerContactId.description: customerContactId (Lead/Interessent/Kunde). Sets also customerPersonalAccountId, customerPersonalAccountNumber, customerPersonalAccountName, customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber, customerName, customerNameExtra, customerNumber, customerContactName, customerContactCustomerNumber. Must be set if project is not mandatory. Ignored otherwise.

customerContactName.description: customerContactName - the name of the contact with the given customerContactId.

customerContactCustomerNumber.description: The customer number of the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Allgemein. The field contact number (Kontaktnummer) is the customerContactCustomerNumber.

customerPersonalAccountId.description: The master id of personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId.

customerPersonalAccountNumber.description: The number of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account number (Kontonummer) is the customerPersonalAccountNumber. This field also corresponds to field "debitorNumber" from endpoint  /contact/{customerContactId} and field  "number" from /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountName.description: The name of the personal account associated with the contact with the given customerContactId. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor. Field account name (Kontoname) is the customerPersonalAccountName. This field also corresponds to field "name" from endpoint /debitoraccounts.

customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.description: The customer number of the personal account with the given customerPersonalAccountNumber. Where to find the value in the Scopevisio client: open contact with master id == customerContactId, go to sphere (Rolle) Debitor.  Field customer number (Kundennummer) is the customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.

customerName.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use field customerContactName.

customerNumber.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use fields customerContactCustomerNumber or customerPersonalAccountExternalNumber.

customerNameExtra.description: This field is for internal use only. Please use fields customerContactCustomerNumber or customerPersonalAccountName.

name.example: RE-2018-1, KP für Muster AG vom 27.11.2018

customerContactPerson.description: customerContactPerson (Ansprechpartner). Sets also customerContactPersonName. The contact must be an employee of the project contact (contactId).

documentDate.description: documentDate (PZ-/Angebots-/Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/GS-/LS-Datum). If not given, it is set to the current date. Sets also documentDateMonth.

documentNumber.description: documentNumber (Potenzial-/Angebots-/Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/Gutschrifts-/Lieferscheinnummer).The field is mandatory. If not provided a document number is generated.

ourContactPerson.description: ourContactPerson (Potenzial-/Angebots- Auftrags-/Rechnungs-/Gutschrifts-/Lieferscheinbearbeiter). The UID of a Scopevisio user. The user must have a user contact (Aus Benutzerkontakt) for the current organisation. Setting this field also sets ourContactPersonName.

textIntro.example: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,\nwir erlauben uns, Ihnen wie folgt in Rechnung zu stellen:
textIntro.description: textIntro (Einleitungstext). Use "\n" to insert new line.

textExtro.example: Wir freuen uns, wenn Ihnen das Angebot zusagt und verbleiben mit freundlichen Grüßen
textExtro.description: textExtro (Schlusstext). Use "\n" to insert new line.

selectedAddress.description: selectedAddress (Adresse [Haupt-/Rechnungs-/Liefer-/freie Adresse]). 0 = Hauptadresse, 1 = Rechnungsadresse, 2 = freie Adresse, 3 = Lieferadresse

otherAddress.description: otherAddress (freie Adresse). Use "\n" to insert new line.

readPermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

readPermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails for the read permissions, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionProfiles.example: Firmen und Benutzer - alle Rechte,Finanzen - alle Rechte
writePermissionProfiles.description: comma separated list of profiles for full access, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

writePermissionLogins.description: comma separated list of user login emails, evaluated only if permissionType equals 1.

deliveryDate.description: deliveryDate (Leistungsdatum). The deliveryDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

deliveryDateTo.description: deliveryDateTo (Leistungsdatum-bis). The deliveryDateTo as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

endDiscount.description: endDiscount(Schlussrabatt), if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to true, then endDiscount should be an amount, if isEndDiscountAbsolute is set to false then a percentage is needed.

paymentTypeName.description: paymentTypeName (Zahlungsart). If not provided for new invoice, the payment type from the personal account (connected to the customerContactId) is used. Sets also paymentType.

isPaid.description: isPaid (Auf exportiertem Beleg als Bezahlt ausweisen)

discountDate1.description: discountDate1 (Skontodatum 1). The discountDate1 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. If it is set either discountPercent1 or discountAmount1 must be set. If one of the payment term properties is provided (discountDate1, discountDate2, dueDate, discountPercent1, discountPercent2, discountAmount1, discountAmount2) when creating an invoice, then the form is used. Otherwise the payment term from the personal account (connected to the customerContactId) is used.

discountDate2.description: discountDate2 (Skontodatum 2). The discountDate2 as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate1. If it is set either discountPercent2 or discountAmount2 must be set.

dueDate.description: dueDate (Fälligkeitsdatum). The dueDate as epoch timestamp in milliseconds. It must be greater than discountDate2.

discountPercent1.description: discountPercent1 (Skontosatz1). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountPercent2.description: discountPercent2 (Skontosatz2). Either discount percent(s) or discount amount(s) are allowed. Setting both is not possible. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

explicitDiscount.description: explicitDiscount (Skontobeträge manuell eingeben). If set discountAmount(s) must be provided

discountAmount1.description: discountAmount1 (Skontobetrag1). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate1 must be set too.

discountAmount2.description: discountAmount2 (Skontobetrag2). Only evaluated if explicitDiscount is true. If set discountDate2 must be set too.

salesPhase.description: salesPhase (Potenzial-/Angebotsphase).  Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio desktop client for allowable values.

salesClassification.description: salesClassification (Angebotspriorität).  Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio desktop client for allowable values.
enum: VIP Priorität (sehr wichtig und sehr dringlich)
D Priorität (nicht wichtig und nicht dringlich)

salesActivity.description: salesActivity (Folgeaktivität).  Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio desktop client for allowable values.

phase.description: phase (Verkaufswahrscheinlichkeit).  Sets also phaseId. Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio desktop client for allowable values.

closingDateTs.description: closingDateTs (Entscheidungsdatum). Sets also closingDateMonth The closingDateTs as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

reminderDateTs.description: reminderDateTs (Wiedervorlage). The reminderDateTs as epoch timestamp in milliseconds.

zoneNumber.description: zoneNumber (Rechnungskreis). Please check your zone settings in the Scopevisio client application if the field is mandaotry.

customFieldName.description: See our documentation for how the names are put together.

json.description: the json data to be imported

person.description: true = Person, false = Gesellschaft. Evaluated only when creating a contact.

position.description: Position (Stelle). Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio client application for different values.

positionReplacement.description: positionReplacement (Position). Same as position.Please check your catalog in the Scopevisio client application for different values.

department.description: Department (Abteilung). The value is set only if the contact is a personal contact. lease check your catalog in the Scopevisio client application for different values

industry.description: Industry (Branche). Please check your catalog for allowable values.

description.description: Description (Notiz). Use "\\\n" to insert new line.

vatId.description: vatId/taxId. If the kontakt has personal account(s) assigned, the vatId will not be updated in the accounts.

currency.description: currency. If the kontakt has personal account(s) assigned, the currency will not be updated in the accounts.

employers.description: Employer and visibility in role "Arbeitnehmer".If more than one employer of type "Hauptarbeitgeber" is given, the last in the list is set in the contact card "Angaben zur Person"

deliveryTermIncoterm.description: Incoterms (Sphere Vendor/Rolle Lieferant). The allowable values depend on the system catalog in the Scopevisio client application.

ownerUid.description: ownerUid (Kontaktinhaber). The UID of a scopevisio user
